channel.title: Tildrun's Craft Notes
channel.description: Helping you navigate a Horror-touched life

item.title: Writer's Block of 2024
item.description: Read <a href="https://tildrunscraftnotes.web.id/#2024writersblock">this "Personal Essays" articlet on the writer's block of the past few months (and sneak peeks of future topics). Apparently, some things are not meant to be written yet. Thank you for helping me keep RSS alive.

item.title: #JanganNontonVina: A Case Study in Avatar Ethics
item.description: Read this "Praxis" article for discussion on how the horror movie "Vina: Sebelum 7 Hari" goes against the implicit Avatar Ethics on handling Statement-adjacent material. Thank you for helping me keep RSS alive.

item.title: Card, Spin, Knit: Reflections on Craftsmanship in the Hyperspeed Age
item.description: Read this "Personal Essays" article for June 2024's Indieweb Carnival theme "DIY - Something from (Almost) Nothing" with reflections on the many ways intentional craftsmanship is meaningful. Thank you for helping me keep RSS alive.

item.title: Aligned, Avatar, Apotheosis: Making sense of devotional relationships
item.description: Read this "101 post" article on devotional relationships in the Dreadful Traditions and how it ties into the concept of Avatars in The Magnus Archives. Thank you for helping me keep RSS alive.

item.title: When The Stars Are Right: The Eclipse of 8 April 2024
item.description: Read this "Debriefs" article on the experience of carrying out an impromptu Eclipse Ritual. Thank you for helping me keep RSS alive.

item.title: "Jon, what does human even mean? I mean, really
item.description: Read this "Personal Essays" article on Alterhumanity and how it ties into my mundane and religious life

item.title: "Is this Something or did I imagine it?" A guide to Discernment
item.description: Read this "101 posts" article on discernment and functional insanity in the Dreadful Traditions. Thank you for helping me keep RSS alive.

item.title: Eldritch narratives and how to find Them
item.description: Read this "101 posts" article on the function of Narrative in Pop Culture Paganism and Constructed Pantheons. Thank you for helping me keep RSS alive.

item.title: In Medias Res, or "no, you're not going to cause an apocalypse"
item.description: Read this "101 posts" article providing reassurance to the new Dreadful Practitioner. Thank you for helping me keep RSS alive.
